title: Tea (Camellia sinensis) cultivated in three agro-ecological regions of Bangladesh: Unveiling the variability of methylxanthine, bioactive phenolic compound, and antioxidant activity
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Abu Tareq Mohammad Abdullah, Mahbuba Ibrahim Sayka, Mohammad Mahfuzur Rahman, Miskat Sharif, Tanzir Ahmed Khan, Sharmin Jahan, Reaz Mohammad Mazumdar, Mohammad Nashir Uddin, Md. Mozammel Hoque
